message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is worth more than $10000 to me, but I believe in fair trade and am willing to consider your valuation. To start our negotiation, I am offering the product for $15000. I look forward to discussing how we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $15000 is significantly above my budget.  I'm interested in your product, but I can only offer $10000 at this time.  Let's see if we can find common ground.
